title: What do you like most about your job? What motivates you at work?

korean: 우리 팀 분위기가 정말 좋아서 출근이 즐거워.
동료들이 서로 도와주고 배려하는 문화가 있어.
업무하면서 새로운 기술 배울 수 있는 게 좋아.
회사에서 교육 지원도 해줘서 성장할 기회가 많아.
고객한테 감사하다는 말 들으면 보람 느껴져.
우리 팀장님이 피드백을 잘 해주셔서 발전하는 느낌이야.
실수해도 질책보다는 어떻게 개선할지 같이 고민해 줘.
가끔 재택근무도 할 수 있어서 편해.
월급이 더 높으면 좋겠지만, 전반적으로 만족해.
앞으로도 이 회사에서 계속 일하고 싶어.
english: Our team atmosphere is really good, so, like, going to work is enjoyable.
There's a culture where colleagues help and, you know, care for each other.
I like that I can learn new technologies while working.
The company also provides education support, so there are many opportunities to grow.
When a project is completed, the sense of achievement is, I mean, tremendous.
When I hear customers say thank you, I feel rewarded.
Our team leader gives good feedback, so I feel like I'm developing.
Even if I make mistakes, rather than scolding, well, they think together about how to improve.
It's a flexible work system, so it's good for, like, work-life balance.
Sometimes I can also work from home, so it's comfortable.
It would be nice if the salary was higher, but, you know, overall I'm satisfied.
I want to continue working at this company in the future.
